source.name: Land Trust and City List
source.description: The 2012-2013 Abatement cycle is largely completed due to funding restrictions, except for emergency cases and those publicly-owned properties being maintained through the neighborhood Adopt-a-Lot program. The 2012 list of Land trust, City, and Urban Homesteading properties is available for download as an Excel document, if you wish to see what lots are in your neighborhood.  If you have questions or are interested in this Adopt-a-Lot process, please contact John Parks at 816-513-8433.
